ui.panel.lovelace.cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.action_c: Are you sure you want to run action "{action}"?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.no_entit: No entity provided for more info dialog
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.empty_state.no_d: Denne sida let deg ta kontroll på einingane dine, men det ser ut til at du ikkje har sett opp noko endå. Gå til integrasjonssida for å setje i gang.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.safe-mode.descri: ioBroker ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.starting.descrip: ioBroker held på å starte. Ver vennleg og vent.
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.title: Ubrukte oppføringar
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.availa: These are the entities that you have available, but are not in your Lovelace UI yet.
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.select: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then click the add card button.
ui.panel.lovelace.add_entities.yaml_unsu: You cannot use this function when using Lovelace UI in YAML mode.
ui.panel.lovelace.add_entities.generated: You can only use this function when you have taken control of the Lovelace UI.
ui.panel.lovelace.views.confirm_delete_t: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
ui.panel.lovelace.views.confirm_delete_e: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
ui.panel.lovelace.reload_resources.refre: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.head: Rediger konfigurasjon
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.love: Lovelace-konfigurasjonen vart oppdatert. Vil du laste den oppdaterte konfigurasjonen i redigeringsprogrammet og miste gjeldende endringar?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.conf: Are you sure you want to remove your Lovelace UI configuration?
We will automatically generate your Lovelace UI views with your areas and devices if you remove your Lovelace UI configuration.
You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
Your configuration might contains comment(s), these will not be saved. Do you want to continue?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.reso: Resources should no longer be added to the Lovelace configuration but can be added in the Lovelace config panel.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_lovelace.e: Denne tittelen vert vist over alle visningane dine i Lovelace
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.visib: Select which users should see this view in the navigation
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_badges.pan: These badges will not be displayed because this view is in "Panel Mode".
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.pick_: Vel kortet du vil legge til.
Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.unsav: Du har endringar som ikkje er lagra
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.confi: Er du sikker på at du vil avbryte?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.move_card.heade: Choose a view to move the card to
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.suggest_card.he: We created a suggestion for you
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.par: Som standard kjem ioBroker til å vedlikehalde brukargrensesnittet, og oppdatere det når nye oppføringar eller Lovelace-komponentar vert tilgjengelege. Dersom du tek kontroll, vil vi ikkje lenger kunne lage dette til automatisk for deg.
Er du sikker på at du vil ta kontroll over brukergrensesnittet ditt?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.yam: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your Lovelace config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your Lovelace configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_no: Dette elementet har ikkje ein ID. Ver vennleg og legg til ein ID til dette elementet i "ui-lovelace.yaml"-fila di.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_mi: Home assistant kan legge til ID-ar til alle korta og sidene dine automatisk for deg ved å trykke "Overfør konfigurasjon"-knappen.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.alarm-pane: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.calendar.d: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.conditiona: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
Kortet vil visast når alle føresetnadene under er oppfylt.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.d: Oppføringskortet er den vanlegaste korttypen. Den kan gruppere ting inn i lister.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.e: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity.des: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity’s state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.des: Knappekortet let deg legge til knappar som kan uføre oppgåver.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.def: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity-fil: Oppføringsfilterkortet let deg definere ei liste med oppføringar som du vil vise berre når dei har ein spesiell tilstand.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.name: Gauge
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.desc: Målarkortet er eit enkelt kort som let deg visuelt sjå sensordata.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.glance.des: Gløttekortet er nyttig dersom du vil gruppere fleire sensorar i ei kompakt oversikt.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.name: Grid
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.descr: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.logbook.de: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.history-gr: Historiekortet let deg vise ein graf for kvar opplista oppføring.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.horizontal: Horisontalstablekortet let deg stable kort saman horisontalt, slik at dei alltid står ved sidan av kvarandre i same rom som ei kolonne.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.humidifier: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.iframe.des: Websidekortet let deg vise favorittwebsida di rett inn i ioBroker
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.name: Light
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.desc: Lyskortet gjer slik at du kan endre lysstyrka til eit lys.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.ma: Vil du legge til eit tilpassa kort eller vil du berre skrive yaml manuelt?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.name: Map
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.descri: Kartkortet som let deg vise oppføringar på eit kart.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.markdown.d: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.media-cont: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture.de: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-el: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-en: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-gl: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more info dialog.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.plant-stat: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.sensor.des: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.shopping-l: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
Dette kortet krev at "shopping_list"-integrasjonen er sett opp.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.thermostat: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.vertical-s: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.weather-fo: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.view.panel_mode: This renders the first card at full width. Other cards in this view as well as badges will not be rendered.
Denne sida har fleire enn eitt kort, men panelvisning kan berre vise eitt kort i gangen.
ui.panel.lovelace.warning.starting: ioBroker held på å starte. Det kan hende at alt ikkje er tilgjengeleg endå.
ui.panel.lovelace.changed_toast.message: Lovelace-konfigurasjonen vart oppdatert. Ønsker du å friske opp?
